title: Recruiting For A Serious Ranked 5's Team
body:
Hello
We are looking for people around the silver area to join our rank 5's team, 
Here are the roles that we have/need filled
Top: Not Taken
Jungle: UnseenBlade (Me)
Mid: Not Taken
Ad: Not Taken
Support: Purrfect (Leader)

We would love to have more people join the team :D
{{summoner:31}}


We need your
Age
Rank
Ign
Main Roles
Main Champs
Pref Skype <3
